string.text: What would you like to name your settlement?
Are you sure you want to build your town here?
This settlement is currently still under construction.
A player town has been created on a later save. Older saves are not supported and could cause save corruption or town 'ghosting'.
Are you sure you want to build your village here?
Choose the type of primary product for {VILLAGE}
Are you sure you want to build your castle here?
Choose the settlement to which this village is bound
{SETTLEMENT_NAME} was founded by {HERO_NAME} of the {FACTION_TERM} on {BUILD_TIME}
I would like to review my options for building a settlement.

Player Settlements has encountered a corrupt template. 
Please screenshot and report this along with the log file at '{LOG_PATH}'. 
{ERROR_DETAIL}

Your game will now have a new emergency save created to avoid crashing. It is highly recommended to close the application before loading.
Choose your gate position. \r\nPress {HELP_KEY} for help. \r\nClick {MOUSE_CLICK} anywhere to apply or press {ESC_KEY} to go back to settlement placement.

Choose your settlement. 
Press {HELP_KEY} for help. 
Click {MOUSE_CLICK} anywhere to apply or press {ESC_KEY} to cancel. 
Use {DEEP_EDIT_KEY} to switch to deep edit mode. 
Use {CYCLE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {CYCLE_BACK_KEY} / {CYCLE_NEXT_KEY} to change visual options.
Use {ROTATE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {ROTATE_BACK_KEY} / {ROTATE_NEXT_KEY} to change rotation. 
Use {ROTATE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {ROTATE_FORWARD_KEY} / {ROTATE_BACKWARD_KEY} to change forward rotation. 
Use {ROTATE_MODIFIER_KEY} + {ROTATE_MODIFIER_ALTERNATE} and {ROTATE_FORWARD_KEY} / {ROTATE_BACKWARD_KEY} to change axis rotation. 
Use {SCALE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {SCALE_BACK_KEY} / {SCALE_NEXT_KEY} to change scale. 
Use {CYCLE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {MOVE_UP_KEY} / {MOVE_DOWN_KEY} to move up or down.

Press {HELP_KEY} for help. 
Press {APPLY_KEY} to apply or press {ESC_KEY} to cancel. 
Use {DEEP_EDIT_KEY} to switch from deep edit mode to placement mode. 
Use {CYCLE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {CYCLE_BACK_KEY} / {CYCLE_NEXT_KEY} to change selected sub model.
Use {ROTATE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {MOUSE_CLICK} to reposition. 
Use {ROTATE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {ROTATE_BACK_KEY} / {ROTATE_NEXT_KEY} to change rotation. 
Use {ROTATE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {ROTATE_FORWARD_KEY} / {ROTATE_BACKWARD_KEY} to change forward rotation. 
Use {ROTATE_MODIFIER_KEY} + {ROTATE_MODIFIER_ALTERNATE} and {ROTATE_FORWARD_KEY} / {ROTATE_BACKWARD_KEY} to change axis rotation. 
Use {SCALE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {SCALE_BACK_KEY} / {SCALE_NEXT_KEY} to change scale. 
Use {CYCLE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {MOVE_UP_KEY} / {MOVE_DOWN_KEY} to move up or down. 
Use {DELETE_KEY} to delete selection. 
Use {UNDELETE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {DELETE_KEY} to un-delete previous deletion.
